title: Black hole winds
abstract: Also available at http://www.blackwell-synergy.com/doi/abs/10.1046/j.1365-8711.2003.06980.x.  The definitive version is available at www.blackwell-synergy.com.We show that black holes accreting at or above the Eddington rate probably produce winds that are optically thick in the continuum, whether in quasars or in X-ray binaries. [Abstract truncated
